attributes.review:
i downloaded this app because i wanted to keep up with our president, like the devoted supporter i am. iâ€™ll be honest, my support for trump has been wavering over the past year, and this was sort of giving him a chance to redeem himself. well, iâ€™ll tell you i was beyond disappointed. the app took about 2 hours(!!) to download, even with perfect wifi connection. it also drained my battery SO FAST! they had me enter my phone number and email, which i willingly did. but for the past day iâ€™ve been getting endless spam calls! i think the trump media team sent my number to telemarketers!! iâ€™ll probably have to get a new phone now, since itâ€™s constantly blowing up with spam. thanks, mr trump, youâ€™ve cost me about $1000 ğŸ˜‘ğŸ˜‘. 

the app is completely biased, which is expect, of course. but the problem lies in the fact that even useful health information is skewed to fit his agenda. we are in the middle of a pandemic, and our administration is providing false news about it??? i thought mr. trump was so against fake news. thatâ€™s one of the reasons why i supported him at first!

needless to say, i will not be voting red in november. it frightens me to think of all the mindless trump supporters who havenâ€™t woken up to his ignorance and idiocy yet. i wish them clarity... our country needs clarity.
attributes.title: the obama app was better!!

attributes.review: Now I got this app as a joke but as soon as I signed up I started receiving these weird emails  coming from â€œdonotreplyâ€. At first I didnâ€™t pay it any mind but then I started getting these emails EVERY DAY and Iâ€™m not gonna lie it creeped me out a bit. This went on for about a month, then I decided that I should reply just to see what would happen. As I expected there was no response but I still continued trying just to see what would happen, then finally on July 7th I got a reply saying â€œHey itâ€™s DT here I was wondering how your doing send a pic and your name so could contact youâ€. When I tell you I almost peed myself Iâ€™m being for real I had NEVER gotten anything like that sent to me in my life so like anyone else would do I didnâ€™t respond. But it got me thinking â€œDTâ€? It HAS to mean Donald Trump right? I meant it is HIS app who else could it be. Anyways the creepy/ sexual emails are still coming and honestly that was very scary considering that I didnâ€™t really put THAT much info it definitely freaked me out that he was able to track down my email.  Donald Trump was raped and sexually assaulted many people including MINORS throughout his life time (Karen Johnson, Jean caroll, Ava Johnson, etc to say the least). In my eyes he should have already been a convicted sex offender. This is UNACCEPTABLE please remove this app
attributes.title: Donald Trump

attributes.review: this honestly is an awful app. i went into this thinking it would be bad but oh boy itâ€™s worse than i thought. he makes you put your phone number in BEFORE you even get to see the app. now thatâ€™s manipulation if iâ€™ve ever seen it. but alas i did and what did i find? you have to enter more information about yourself and then you are met with a POINTS SYSTEM. oh if you donate a lot or share the app or refer a friend you get points (yippee) and you know where those points go towards? TRUMP MERCH. the lowest number of points to get a reward is 5,000 and $1=10 points so you have to donate $500 to get ANYTHING (and itâ€™s only a $25 store discount). oh but get this. you can only donate 2500 points! so you have to get others signed up on the app to get ANYTHING. this is stupid as hell because you get 1 point if you share news on facebook and 100 points when you refer friends so to get to 5,000 points let alone 100,000 (the highest reward amount) is nearly impossible so iâ€™m disgusted. i already hated the orange ğŸ¤®â€™manâ€™ğŸ¤® but this is a ridiculous grab for attention. he doesnâ€™t even give his views and plans on the app itâ€™s just â€œgive me moneyâ€ â€œhate the demsâ€ â€œmeet me in all my greatnessâ€ so itâ€™s useless unless you want to worship him. bad app overall. whoever made it needs to lose their job yesterday.
attributes.title: silly orange man

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my #1 fan (rump), not knowing that this app would be VIRUS filled!!!! As someone who is Black, I am very disgusted by the outcomes of this app. I had just downloaded the app and after not more than 2 minutes of using it, pop up ads about anal stitching popped up. I donâ€™t even look that stuff up! Not to mention the 40-50 notifications I received after an hour of simply having the app on my phone. The app also decided to make my iPhone shutdown about 5 different times because the app would freeze and my phone would be dysfunctional. My home screen is now a picture of rump, which I would never change to since it was my 3 month old butterfly before, who I love very dearly. Also, the app stole my money after I decided to make a $5 donation. After making a donation ONE time, my PayPal notifications skyrocketed and every hour I have been getting a notification that â€œ$5 was taken from your accountâ€ WITHOUT MY CONSENT!!! I also have not received any confirmation emails which goes against the privacy policy so I have no clue if the money is still in my account or in some random red neckâ€™s account. In conclusion, this app deserves to be disintegrated like maggots in kerosene. But remember, ALL APPS MATTER!! Except this one of courseğŸ’—
attributes.title: Viruses, Embezzlement and stitching

attributes.review:
So I was just walking through town looking at my phone when all of the sudden- BAM!! I had walked into a group of trump supporters protesting for all doctors to be replaced with the old-time plague doctors. Before I realized what happened, they surrounded me and threw me into their van. At first I was like, â€œIs this a febreeze commercial??ğŸ˜ğŸ˜â€ but when they gagged me and burned off my finger prints I started to suspect I might be wrong. They took my phone and forced my to tell them my password (cause they had already burned off my prints) and after hours of intense interrogation I caved and told them. They downloaded the app and after the 666 hours it took to download, the entire van (we were still in the van) started to glow orange. They all closed their eyes and started humming the national anthem, and this was when I escaped. I crossed the border and am now living in Canada under an alias, but I know they are still coming for me. Oh no. Theyâ€™re here!! Tell my mother I loved her! *door gets kicked down**dust settles**i look up in horror to see someone in a Trump mask**they rip the mask off and itâ€™s Trump!!* Goodbye cruel world!!! *they drag me out and Iâ€™m never seen again*
Cut to a week later, now Iâ€™m one of the Trump supporters protesting in favor of plague doctors. 
0/10 would not recommend this app.
